titleStmt.title: A reflection of certaine authors that are pretended to disauow the churches infallibilitie in her generall decrees of faith. By F.E.
titleStmt.author: Lechmere, Edmund, d. 1640?

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widdow of Mark Wyon at the golden Phœnix,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Infallibilitie in decrees of councels œcumenicall.
Some print show-through; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
